statements: SELECT id, sensitive_data, created_at FROM secure_data;
SELECT id, encryption_key FROM secure_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM secure_data WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, sensitive_data FROM secure_data ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, sensitive_data, encryption_key FROM secure_data WHERE encryption_key IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM secure_data WHERE id = 1 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, sensitive_data FROM secure_data WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, sensitive_data FROM secure_data WHERE encryption_key LIKE '%abc%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, encryption_key FROM secure_data WHERE id = 3 AND created_at < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, sensitive_data, encryption_key FROM secure_data WHERE sensitive_data IS NOT NULL AND encryption_key IS NOT NULL ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM secure_data;
SELECT sensitive_info, encryption_key FROM secure_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM secure_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, sensitive_info FROM secure_data WHERE encryption_key IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM transmission_logs WHERE encryption_method = 'AES';
SELECT * FROM secure_data WHERE id = 10;
SELECT sensitive_info FROM secure_data WHERE id = 5 AND encryption_key = 'abc123';
SELECT id, sensitive_info, encryption_key FROM secure_data WHERE id > 20 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM transmission_logs WHERE encryption_method = 'AES' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT log_id, data_transferred FROM transmission_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-10-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM data_encryption WHERE id = 1;
SELECT sender_name, receiver_name FROM data_transmission WHERE encrypted_data LIKE 'ABC%';
SELECT encryption_key, encrypted_data FROM data_encryption WHERE id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT log_id, transmission_time, transmission_status FROM transmission_logs WHERE transmission_status = 'success';
SELECT * FROM data_encryption WHERE encrypted_data IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_encryption ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, sender_name, receiver_name FROM data_transmission WHERE sender_name = 'Alice' AND receiver_name = 'Bob';
SELECT transmission_time, transmission_status FROM transmission_logs WHERE transmission_status = 'Successful' ORDER BY transmission_time DESC;
SELECT encrypted_data FROM data_transmission WHERE sender_name = 'Alice' UNION SELECT encrypted_data FROM data_encryption WHERE encryption_key = 'Key123';

SELECT d.id, t.sender_name, t.receiver_name, tl.transmission_status FROM data_encryption d JOIN data_transmission t ON d.id = t.id JOIN transmission_logs tl ON t.id = tl.log_id WHERE tl.transmission_status = 'Failed';
SELECT * FROM secure_data;
SELECT id, data FROM secure_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM secure_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, data FROM secure_data WHERE data LIKE '%search%';
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE username = 'test_user';
SELECT role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_name ASC;
SELECT permission_name FROM permissions WHERE permission_id > 10 ORDER BY permission_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50;
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, user_id, product_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE user_id = 2 AND product_id = 3 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, payment_method, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
